item.title: Flytipping, 7th February
item.description:
A large sofa dumped on the public footpath. Also it’s becoming a dumping ground for residential waste. Lots of bin liners and bag being ripped open and emptied across the footpath and the road. It has been like this for months now. Needs clearing as a matter of urgency.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 204-210, Bexley Road, Northumberland Heath, Erith, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot hole outside driveway, 7th February
item.description:

item.title: Crater like potholes, 7th February
item.description:
Again Greenwich council ignoring crater like potholes in Shooters Hill. Now they have damaged several cars and vans. Yet still ignored. No wonder a red rating has been given to them
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shooters Hill, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal bonfire,first avenue, 7th February
item.description:
Logged as parks and open spaces issue,but it is actually an enviromental issue.please pass onto the enviromental team again as nothing has been done about the constant bonfires being lit in the garden of we think number 47.first avenue.this is a bonfire almost every other day in what i believe to be a conservation area.please can someone atleast put a leaflet through the doors of first avenue,da7 5ss to let them know this is illegal and anti social.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): First Avenue, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car has been here unmoved for many weeks. It is taxed., 7th February
item.description:
Debris under car and a blocked drain is leading to flooding over the pavement. There are several schools nearby and the pavement is heavily used by all ages.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 74, South Eden Park Road, Eden Park, Greater London
